name: MEC Universal Gear Loft
categories: Gear lofts, vestibules and tent add-ons
description: Save floor space and keep damp stuff off your sleeping bag with this overhead shelf. It installs in your tent in seconds.Nylon mesh with nylon binding tape for fray-free edges.Reflective cord for visibility.Soft rubber clips and nylon hooks for attaching to the tent body.Cordlock allows you to tension the circumference as required.Fits tents with internal gear loft attachment loops.6-sided design.Dimensions are Small: widest point 50cm, sides 25cm; Large: widest point 70 cm, side 35cm.
